TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FederationConfiguration extends System.Object

summary.span: Exposes properties that contain federation settings that control the behavior of the WS-Federation Authentication Module () and the Session Authentication Module () in web applications.

span.span: Exposes properties that contain federation settings that control the behavior of the WS-Federation Authentication Module () and the Session Authentication Module () in web applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，web 應用程式擁有單一物件透過存取屬性。By default web applications have a single object that is accessed through the property. 第一次在屬性經過存取新從組態檔中設定初始化執行個體和就會引發事件。The first time the property is accessed a new instance is initialized from settings in the configuration file and the event is raised. 您可以使用的屬性和方法所公開類別修改或取代從事件處理常式中的組態初始化物件。You can use the properties and methods exposed by the class to modify or replace the object initialized from configuration in an event handler. 此物件是透過事件處理常式內部的屬性。This object is available through the property inside the event handler.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 新執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫方法，以確保已正確初始化執行個體。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by loading settings from the section of the configuration file.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by loading settings from the section of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的新執行個體的屬性會初始化所載入的設定``組態區段。The properties in the new instance are initialized by loading settings from the `` configuration section. 這個建構函式呼叫具有建構函式`loadConfig`參數`true`。This constructor calls the constructor with the `loadConfig` parameter `true`. > [!WARNING] > 新執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫方法，以確保已正確初始化執行個體。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool loadConfig) cil managed

param.name: loadConfig
param.span: to initialize with settings loaded from the configuration file; to initialize to default values.

span.span: to initialize with settings loaded from the configuration file; to initialize to default values.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by optionally loading settings from the section of the configuration file.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by optionally loading settings from the section of the configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 新執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫方法，以確保已正確初始化執行個體。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized. `system.identityModel`中必須指定區段`
`項目底下``擲回例外狀況的組態檔中的項目。The `system.identityModel` section must be specified in a `
` element under the `` element in the configuration file or an exception is thrown. ```
``` 如果`loadConfig`是`true`和只有一個``指定項目，則使用該元素載入設定。If `loadConfig` is `true` and only a single `` element is specified, settings are loaded using that element. 若為多個``元素來指定，則方法會嘗試載入未命名的項目中設定。If multiple `` elements are specified, the method attempts to load settings from the element that is unnamed of that has the . 如果這類項目不存在，則方法會傳回而不載入設定。If such an element does not exist, the method returns without loading settings. 這會導致例外狀況時方法呼叫。This results in an exception when the method is called. > [!WARNING] > Microsoft 建議，如果您指定多個``中的項目`system.identityModel.services`組態區段的至少其中一個未命名或其名稱設為空字串。Microsoft recommends that if you specify multiple `` elements in the `system.identityModel.services` configuration section that at least one of them is unnamed or has its name set to an empty string.

exception.span: The configuration section is not defined in the configuration file.

span.span: The configuration section is not defined in the configuration file.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element with the specified name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 新執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫方法，以確保已正確初始化執行個體。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized. 如果在呼叫這個建構函式則``組態區段``具有指定的名稱的項目必須在組態檔。If this constructor is called then a `` configuration section with a `` element that has the specified name must exist in the configuration file. 這兩個`system.identityModel`區段和`system.identityModel.services`中必須指定`
`下的項目``擲回例外狀況的組態檔中的項目。Both the `system.identityModel` section and the `system.identityModel.services` must be specified in a `
` elements under the `` element in the configuration file or an exception is thrown. ```
```

span.span: The cookie handler to be used by the Session Authentication Module (SAM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定用來讀取和寫入工作階段 cookie 由 SAM cookie 處理常式。Specifies the cookie handler that is used to read and write session cookies by the SAM. 當初始化從組態檔，這個屬性由設定[ <Requiressl> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)項目。When initialized from a configuration file, this property is set by the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed
abstract member Initialize : unit -> unit override this.Initialize : unit -> unit

span.span: Initializes the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可確保目前的執行個體已正確初始化後，會由 HTTP 模組用來處理傳入的要求。This method ensures that the current instance is properly initialized before it is used by the HTTP Modules to process incoming requests. 它應該只呼叫一次。It should only be called once. 請檢查屬性，才能呼叫方法。Check the property before calling the method. 這個方法會設定屬性設定`true`。This method sets the property is set `true`. 預設實作會建立預設 cookie 處理常式，如果有不是其中一個已設定透過屬性和呼叫身分識別設定物件上的方法，透過設定屬性。The default implementation creates a default cookie handler if there is not one already configured through the property and calls the method on the identity configuration object that is configured through the property. 您可以覆寫這個方法來修改此行為或提供額外的初始化衍生類別中。You can override this method to modify this behavior or to provide additional initialization in derived classes. 類別可由 HTTP 模組來處理傳入的要求之前，應叫用此方法。This method should be invoked before the class is used by the HTTP Modules to process incoming requests.

exception.span: The current instance has already been initialized (The property is .)

span.span: The current instance has already been initialized (The property is .)

summary.span: Loads the properties for the current instance from the configuration file.

span.span: Loads the properties for the current instance from the configuration file.

summary.span: This method is called by constructors that initialize the newly created from configuration settings.

span.span: This method is called by constructors that initialize the newly created from configuration settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定新建立之屬性的建構函式會呼叫方法從指定的物件``項目。The method is called by the constructors to set the properties of the newly created object from the specified `` element. 如果`element`是`null`，預設值載入執行個體。If `element` is `null`, the instance is loaded with default values. 如果沒有組態檔，或如果具名的區段不存在，則任何例外狀況會擲回，改為執行個體載入具有預設值。If the there is no configuration file, or, if the named section does not exist, then no exception is thrown, instead the instance is loaded with default values.
